thread.title: Qudra Automotive Trading Company launched as the new agent of Isuzu in the Kingdom
thread.title_full: Qudra Automotive Trading Company launched as the new agent of Isuzu in the Kingdom | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Qudra Automotive Trading Company launched as the new agent of Isuzu in the Kingdom
text:
(MENAFN Press) Qudra Automotive Trading Company recently announced the launch of its business and its establishment as the exclusive dealer of Isuzu in the Kingdom. The company also unveiled its new Isuzu showroom on Mecca Street, enhanced by a specialized and integrated service center in Bayader.
Qudra Automotive Trading Company was launched following the recent signing of an exclusive dealership agreement with Isuzu Japan to become the authorized dealer and distributor of Isuzu vehicles in the Kingdom.

The new showroom was unveiled during a press conference for media representatives, held on Monday, August 31. The launch event showcased Isuzu's latest line of D-Max trucks, which are redefining toughness with their ruggedness and durability. The event also showcased the automaker's latest line of commercial N-Series trucks, including the NPR.

Speaking on the occasion, Qudra Automotive Trading Company CEO Mohammad Alayyan said, "We are proud to celebrate the beginning of Qudra Automotive Trading Company's fruitful journey, which is being launched through our latest local investments in the automotive industry - specifically, in the lightweight truck and heavy commercial vehicle segments. We are honored to be exclusively representing Isuzu Japan, a global pioneer in the production of commercial vehicles. With the launch of Qudra Automotive Trading Company and the establishment of our partnership with Isuzu Motors, we are eager to build upon Isuzu's trademark combination of advanced safety, economically and environmentally friendly performance, and superb service. I would like to sincerely thank Isuzu Motors for their trust and support, which we are keen to build upon. With our modern showroom, dedicated service facilities and our well-trained team, we at Qudra Automotive are ready to meet and exceed the expectations of Isuzu customers in Jordan."

For his part, Executive Vice President of Isuzu Japan, Mr. Takanobo Furuta, said, "It is our pleasure to celebrate the launch of our new partnership with Qudra Automotive Trading Company, our strategic partner and exclusive representative in the Jordanian market. We have great confidence in the company's board of directors, who have extensive experience and well-established knowledge across all aspects of the automotive industry, both locally and regionally. Their expertise will undoubtedly contribute to the success of Qudra Automotive Trading Company, helping Isuzu and its products achieve prominence in the Jordanian market, which is considered an important regional hub for trade and industry."

With the opening of Qudra Automotive's landmark facilities, automotive customers across the Kingdom will now be able to experience Isuzu's uncompromising commitment to making better products and forging better partnerships with the world.

Founded in 1916, Isuzu Motors boasts the longest history of any Japanese vehicle manufacturer. Focusing on "creation without compromise," Isuzu is a global leader in the production of commercial vehicles and trucks, and is the world's leading manufacturer of diesel engines. Through its technological strength and its presence in more than 100 countries, Isuzu strives to gain the trust of each and every person around the world.
